title: Chhandamtu i ropui zarah
lyrics:
Chhandamtu, i ropui zarah,
Hahchawlhna nuam a awm;
I theihna buaina tinreng,
Ata min hruai chhuak la.

I mangan a hnenah thlen la,
I mangan a hnenah thlen la,
I mangan a hnenah thlen la,
Anin a lo tanpui zel ang che.

I hnena kan rawn thlen apiang,
Lawm takin i chhang thin;
Lungngaih, thlaphan, buaina tinreng,
Hrehawmna zawng zawng nen.

Eng nge lungngaia kan khah ang,
Hrehawmna lo thlenin?
Ring lote hlauvin an khur ang,
Kan lawmna niah chuan.
